properties.Name: Potomac Gorge
properties.Description: One of the goals of the creation of the Parkway was to preserve views of the Potomac Gorge.

properties.Name: Roaches Run Wildlife Sanctuary
properties.Description: a wildlife sanctuary at Roaches Run, near National Airport, was recommended by the original designers of the highway.

properties.Name: Dyke Marsh Wildlife Preserve
properties.Description: A wildlife preserve at Dyke Marsh was planned

properties.Name: Riverside Park Picnic Area
properties.Description: This picnic area was part of the original design of the Mount Vernon Memorial Highway and was part of the recreational facilities designed by park planners

properties.Name: Carderock Pavillion
properties.Description: The Carderock Recreation Area was originally planned as two picnic areas under Mission 66; however, only one was built.

properties.Name: Fort Hunt Picnic Pavilion A
properties.Description: The Fort Hunt Picnic Pavilion and Fort Hunt Park were built under Mission 66.

properties.Name: Mount Vernon Terminus
properties.Description: At the Mount Vernon terminus is a landscaped traffic circle with flanking parking areas screened by vegetation in accordance with the original design. This section was also designed to showcase the areaâ€™s natural attributes, chiefly the Potomac River, its tributaries and marshes, and the rolling, forested terrain meeting them.

properties.Name: View of the Washington Monument from Monument View Hill
properties.Description: The allee of trees and view of the Washington Monument from Monument View Hill

properties.Name: Route 123 Intersection
properties.Description: The intersection was built in the late 1950s and advanced engineering approaches and a modernist approach to landscape plantings and design.

The views and guidewalls by the Windy Run bridge are an example of the harmonious use of landscape architecture and engineering to preserve vistas and maintain safe traffic flow. Similar views and guidewalls can be found throughout the northern section of the parkway.
properties.Name: Views and Guidewalls, GWMP North
